name: web-terminal
description: A comprehensive web-based terminal application with NestJS backend and React frontend

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix server && npm install --prefix client
scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run prod:server
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules server/node_modules server/dist client/node_modules client/dist
